title: Online Simulation-Based Leadership Training for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Healthcare Management Knowledge and Proficiency in Basic Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Short-Intensive Training for Healthcare Administrators in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments, Emphasizing Practical Simulation-Based Learning Experiences

learning_goals: Learners can perform leadership decision-making processes in medical settings via VR simulation with over 80% accuracy
Learners successfully complete virtual medical team management scenarios using digital collaboration tools at least three times
Learners submit medical service improvement proposals through an online assessment system within 72 hours

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
